name: X Caeli: The Iron Hand of Love
description: Long-dead evil god has been resurrected in servitude to a beautiful spaceship crew who, luckily, are too rational-minded to believe in his true nature. Conquering galaxies was all to easy for him but now, to survive, he must conquer their hearts. Oh, and protect them from mysterious invaders too.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
